title: Face unlock is not working after Dec. 2019 update(renewing face data issue)
content:
Today, I did update PIXEL 4 XL to Dec. 2019 version(QQ1B.191205.012.A1).
In this situation, face unlock was working.
After that, I deleted my face data to renew my face.
And then, I setup my face.
After this step, face unlock is not working.
PIXEL 4 XL is displayed "face is not detected. Try again" in lock screen.
I used PIXEL 4 XL in Republic of Korea. So, I think above message is not match to English perfectly .
In this situation, how can I fix it?
I think this situation was affected from recently update.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
